name: Swix T73 Digital Sport Waxing Iron
description: A waxing iron with a thick plate that makes for even heat distribution. Digital temperature reading means it’s easy to get the perfect setting.18mm thick plate ensure even heat distribution.Digital microprocessor ensure a precise temperature control.Digital display is controlled by the wheel adjustment.Operating temperatures of 80 to 170°C.With 850W of heating power, you'll have plenty of heat to melt your wax.
